biography:
From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia

Charlotte Ninon Coleman (3 April 1968 â€“ 14 November 2001) was an English actress best known for playing Scarlett in the film Four Weddings and a Funeral, Jess in the television drama Oranges Are Not the Only Fruit, and her childhood roles of Sue in Worzel Gummidge and the character Marmalade Atkins. Coleman died of an acute asthma attack in Holloway, North London, aged 33.
name: Charlotte Coleman
